mapper.select: select calculate_finanical_company_year from calculate_finanical_company group by calculate_finanical_company_year

SELECT (SUM(c.contract_nomal_total_fee_sum) + SUM(c.contract_add_total_fee_sum) + SUM(c.contract_total_sliding_sum)) AS total_fee , (SUM(CASE WHEN u.user_business_type_cd = 5100 THEN c.contract_nomal_ag_fee_sum ELSE null END) + SUM(CASE WHEN u.user_business_type_cd = 5100 THEN c.contract_add_ag_fee_sum ELSE null END) + SUM(CASE WHEN u.user_business_type_cd = 5100 THEN c.contract_ag_sliding_sum ELSE null END) ) AS ag_personal_fee , (SUM(CASE WHEN u.user_business_type_cd = 5200 THEN c.contract_nomal_ag_fee_sum ELSE null END) + SUM(CASE WHEN u.user_business_type_cd = 5200 THEN c.contract_add_ag_fee_sum ELSE null END) + SUM(CASE WHEN u.user_business_type_cd = 5200 THEN c.contract_ag_sliding_sum ELSE null END) ) AS ag_company_fee , (SUM(c.contract_nomal_dp_fee_sum) + SUM(c.contract_add_dp_fee_sum) + SUM(c.contract_dp_sliding_sum)) AS dp_fee , l.ledger_financial_company_cd , (SELECT code_name FROM code WHERE code_id = l.ledger_financial_company_cd) AS ledger_financial_company_cd_name FROM contract c JOIN ledger l ON c.contract_ledger_seq = l.ledger_seq JOIN approval a ON c.contract_ledger_seq = a.approval_ledger_seq JOIN users u ON a.approval_user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.contract_create_year = #{contractCreateYear} AND c.contract_create_month = #{contractCreateMonth} AND a.approval_state = '승인' AND a.approval_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY l.ledger_financial_company_cd
